channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: Internal files from an Interpol whistleblower shared exclusively with BBC Eye and Disclose reveal that Russia is consistently breaking Interpol's rules when requesting arrests abroad. #Russia #Ukraine #Interpol #Whistleblower #BBCNews

item.title: White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt says it’s Trump’s “hope, wish and demand” for the resistance and chaos in Minneapolis to end, following the fatal shooting of US citizen Alex Pretti during an altercation with Border Patrol. #AlexPretti #WhiteH

item.title: Minnesota Representative Ilhan Omar was uninjured and continued to speak at the event following the incident. Anthony James Kazmierczak, 55, has been charged with third degree assault and is being held in custody, according to the local sheriff's office.
